titles.title: To reduce temporarily the duty on certain transaxles.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 4/27/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce, through December 31, 2008, the duty on transaxles, incorporating an integral electronic controller, designed for use in certain hybrid motor vehicles.
